column1: Applied Computational Science and Engineering - MSc
column5: Our MSc in Applied Computational Science and Engineering will educate future domain-specialists in computational science.This course will expand your knowledge of numerical methods, computational science, and how to solve large scale problems by applying novel science and engineering approaches. It is suitable for graduates of disciplines including maths and physical sciences, geophysics and engineering, and computer science.This immersive, hands-on MSc course will enable students to develop their skills and techniques for a range of science and engineering applications utilising High Performance Computing resources. Students will learn alongside world-class researchers in the Department of Earth Science and Engineering.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
